    • Method Detail

      • newPoolInstance

        protected static org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool newPoolInstance()
        Creates a pool for Engine objects. So a number of objects is always available and ready to start immediatly.
        Returns:
        GenericObjectPool

      • getEngineFromPool

        public static Engine getEngineFromPool()
        Obtains an instance from this pool.
        By contract, clients must call returnEngine(org.grobid.core.engines.Engine) when they finish to use the engine.

      • returnEngine

        public static void returnEngine(Engine engine)
        By contract, engine must have been obtained using getEngineFromPool().

      • newInstance

        protected static GrobidPoolingFactory newInstance()
        Creates and returns an instance of GROBIDFactory. The init() method will be called.
